channel.title: Does anyone know how to type the @ symbol with scar?
channel.description: this is what i have, KeyDown(GetKeyCode('@')); and instead of @, it types 2. can someone help?

item.title: Does anyone know how to type the @ symbol with scar?
item.dc:creator: @johnnyboy2 johnnyboy2
item.source: Does anyone know how to type the @ symbol with scar?

item.title: Does anyone know how to type the @ symbol with scar?
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

That is because the ‘@’ character is actually on the 2 key (As I know you do already know but this helps explaining) which means when you use getKeyCode it returns the 2 key.

So just like you would normally to get the @ character, you must also have shift pressed down for it to appear as ‘@’.

KeyDown(VK_SHIFT); KeyDown(GetKeyCode('@')); KeyUp(GetKeyCode('@')); KeyUp(VK_SHIFT);

Just don’t forget to put small wait times inbetween down and up to make it look more human like if your doing on a game your not suppose to macro on

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone know how to type the @ symbol with scar?

KeyDown(GetKeyCode(’@’));
and instead of @, it types 2.
can someone help?
